reviews.text:
Great value to this hotel!! Cheap with breakfast included!!
Only one issue with the room.
We got a room with views, sadly we can hear the trams passing by.
Breakfast tasty.
Close to most attractions of Riga. Walking distance.

The location is great - close to tram/train/bus and walking distance to old town. Quite charming as well but not by any means particularly comfortable.

The beds are very hard and the AC was not adjustable (except the fan speed but I'm still unsure if it was actually cooling or heating...). You could open the windows but it was quite noisy from a nearby night club.

Breakfast was ok. Not the best selection and the same each day.

I would only recommend this hotel for the price and the location. For a good night's sleep I'd to anywhere else.

This hotel is fabulous. The location is perfect for exploring Riga on foot. The room was very spacious and the ensuite was large and had a really good shower. The complimentary bottles of water which were left every day were a nice touch. The noise from the trams didn't bother us too much.

The breakfasts are amazing with so much choice. My only minor complaint is that a couple of mornings when I asked for fried eggs they arrived somewhat cold.

A lovely historical hotel. Great location and clean, charming, modern rooms. Excellent breakfast and breakfast mimosas for those wishing to start their day off with a kick!
Excellent coffee as well. Check out at 12noon was also a great comfort for us as we were taking it slow

As regular visitors to Riga, we were so pleased to try out the Metropole. We were not dissapointed. The check in was very efficient  and the pleasant lady on reception gave us all the information we needed. Lovely comfortable and well equipped room overlooking the inner courtyard.
The breakfast is substantive.
The whole team at this Hotel were friendly and professional.
Nicely located for the market, old town and central Riga. Absolutely wonderful experience.
